text: Steven Siro Vai (born June 6, 1960) is an American guitarist, composer, singer, songwriter, and producer. Vai has been described as a "highly individualistic player" and part of a generation of "heavy rock and metal virtuosi who came to the fore in the 1980s". Vai started his music career in 1978 at the age of eighteen as a transcriptionist for Frank Zappa, == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Musicians from New York (state) Category:1960 births Category:Living people
title: Steve Vai
